question: After a period of steady increase, the rate of coal consumption was 50% higher during 2009 than it was during the year 2000. If this trend continues, which impact will coal consumption most likely have on the environment after the year 2010?
candidate_answers: (A) decreased rates of deforestation (B) decreased atmospheric temperatures (C) increased amounts of radioactive waste (D) increased levels of greenhouse gas emissions
label: C
